scripts.push: npm run pushdev && npm run pushsito
scripts.pushsito: npm run prestart && cd out/ && node -e "console.log('now path on :',process.cwd())" && git add . && git commit -m  " %npm_package_config_commitmessage% " && git push origin master
scripts.pushdev: git add . && cross-var git commit -m   "$npm_package_config_commitmessage"  && git push origin master
scripts.testCross: cross-var node -e "console.log('now path on :', \"$npm_package_config_commitmessage\")" && cross-var node -e "console.log('now path on :', \"$npm_package_config_commitmessage\")"

config.commitmessage: 改用 next-mdx,扩展 markdown 功能， about文字应用 markdown ,
